properties.Observatio: This water source is Located in wewpahaliya water catchment area. A well-functioning water project. Even though there are stock tanks, there is no filtration system to purify the water.
properties.Descriptio:
Construction of Filter tank and Connecting to the storage tank

Construction of 1.0 m x 1.0 m x 1.5 m (LxWxH) filter tank with necessary parts

Providing the filter media

Connecting storage tank and filtering tank with necessary pipes and fittings

Misc
